shipIcon.name: icon_auto
shipIcon.tooltip: AUTOMATED: This enemy is automated, meaning it cannot be crew-killed. Systems act as though they are manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room.

shipIcon.name: icon_auto_boss
shipIcon.tooltip: AUTO OVERRIDE: This enemy is also protected by an automated mode that will take over if all of the crew are dead. If auto-mode activates, the ship will gain all benefits that Auto-ships receive. It is impossible to neutralize this vessel via crew kill.

shipIcon.name: icon_threat
shipIcon.tooltip: HIGH LEVEL THREAT: This enemy might pose a major threat to an unprepared vessel. Think carefully if this is an enemy you want to face, and keep your engines ready to run if things go south.

shipIcon.name: icon_majorthreat
shipIcon.tooltip: MAJOR LEVEL THREAT: Avoid conflict with this enemy at all costs. You have a higher chance of slaying god than this ship.

shipIcon.name: icon_lowthreat
shipIcon.tooltip: LOW LEVEL THREAT: This enemy poses very little threat to your vessel. Feel free to disregard any threats made by the captain of this sorry ship.

shipIcon.name: icon_specialwep
shipIcon.tooltip: SPECIAL WEAPON: This enemy is carrying a special custom-built weapon or drone. Destroying the vessel only has a 50% chance to drop the item, but killing the crew will guarantee it drops.

shipIcon.name: icon_station
shipIcon.tooltip: STATION: This enemy is a station, meaning it has zero evasion without cloaking.

shipIcon.name: icon_resist
shipIcon.tooltip: RESISTANT ROOMS: This enemy has one or more resistant rooms, marked by the grey border and R icon in the top left. Resistant rooms will take no system damage from weapons, but can be damaged by crew and fires. Resistant rooms will take ion and hull damage as normal.

shipIcon.name: icon_no2
shipIcon.tooltip: DEPRESSURIZED: This enemy is depressurized, meaning it has no Oxygen system. Oxygen restoring crew such as Orchids will not be able to fill this ship with oxygen. Boarding with aerobic crew is not advised without proper precautions.

shipIcon.name: icon_invasion
shipIcon.tooltip: INVASION TACTICS: This enemy uses special boarding tactics. Rather than teleporting back crew at low health, it will prioritize sending in more crew instead.

shipIcon.name: icon_math
shipIcon.tooltip: EDUTAINMENT: The malfunctioning Auto is programmed to periodically ask you mathematical questions. Getting these questions wrong could lead to dangerous results, so be careful!

shipIcon.name: icon_shieldboost
shipIcon.tooltip: SHIELD BOOSTER: This enemy's shields recharge 17% quicker.

shipIcon.name: icon_engineboost
shipIcon.tooltip: ENGINE BOOSTER: This enemy's engines charge up 30% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_weaponboost
shipIcon.tooltip: AUTO RELOADER: This enemy's weapons charge 10% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_recontele
shipIcon.tooltip: RECONSTRUCTIVE TELEPORTER: This enemy's crew heal to full every time they teleport.

shipIcon.name: icon_respirators
shipIcon.tooltip: RESPIRATORS: This enemy's crew suffocate at half speed.

shipIcon.name: icon_ionarmor
shipIcon.tooltip: ION FIELD: This enemy has a 50% chance to resist all ion damage.

shipIcon.name: icon_backupdna
shipIcon.tooltip: BACKUP DNA: This enemy's crew will be kept alive in the Clone Bay even if it is destroyed or hacked.

shipIcon.name: icon_nanomedbay
shipIcon.tooltip: MED-BOTS: This enemy's crew will passively heal anywhere on their ship so long as their Medbay is powered, but at 25% speed. Will get stronger with more power in their Medbay system.

shipIcon.name: icon_droneboost
shipIcon.tooltip: DRONE BOOSTER: This enemy's crew drones are granted double movement speed and a 50% boost to combat/sabotage damage and repair/extinguishing speed.

shipIcon.name: icon_scrambler
shipIcon.tooltip: DEFENSE SCRAMBLER: This enemy will jam your Defense Drones, making them incapable of firing. Is only active so long as the enemy hacking system is functional - destroy it for your drones to return to normal.

shipIcon.name: icon_casing
shipIcon.tooltip: SYSTEM CASING: Your crew will sabotage this enemy's systems 65% slower.

shipIcon.name: icon_grid
shipIcon.tooltip: EMANCIPATION GRID: This enemy's systems are extra protected from Ghost erosion, reducing their sabotage damage by 20%. If a door system is present, all crew and drones (including anaerobic crew) will take a base damage of 4hp/s with an extra 1hp for each level of Door Control above 1.

shipIcon.name: icon_pheromones
shipIcon.tooltip: PHEROMONES: This enemy's crew move 25% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_freepheromones
shipIcon.tooltip: SYNTHETIC PHEROMONES: This enemy's crew move 75% faster but have 5% less health.

shipIcon.name: icon_suzpheromones
shipIcon.tooltip: SUZERAIN PHEROMONES: This enemy's crew move 30% faster and their active abilities charge 10% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_bypass
shipIcon.tooltip: ENERGY BYPASS: This enemy can teleport crew or bombs, and mind control through Energy Shields. Its ordinary projectiles will still be unable to penetrate through.

shipIcon.name: icon_zoltan_shield
shipIcon.tooltip: ENERGY SHIELD: This enemy is protected by an Energy Shield. Hacking, Mind Control, boarding drones, teleportation, and all hull-damaging and/or ion weapons will all be blocked until disabled. Alternatively, install the Energy Bypass upgrade to circumvent this shielding.

shipIcon.name: icon_greenhouse
shipIcon.tooltip: KERNEL GREENHOUSE: This enemy possesses an on-board greenhouse, which gives it a 65% chance to not use ammunition when firing its weapons.

shipIcon.name: icon_shell_gas
shipIcon.tooltip: TOXIC GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage non-Shell crew over time.

shipIcon.name: icon_shell_gas_heal
shipIcon.tooltip: EXPEDITIVE GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage non-Shell crew over time. While the enemy Medbay is powered, their crew will heal at 90% speed of level 1 Medbay outside of it.

shipIcon.name: icon_shell_gas_repair
shipIcon.tooltip: NANITE GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage non-Shell crew over time. Actively puts out fires and repairs breaches on the enemy ship.

shipIcon.name: icon_hackstun
shipIcon.tooltip: NEURAL DISRUPTOR: All crew in the room during this enemy's hacking pulse will be stunned.

shipIcon.name: icon_sluggel
shipIcon.tooltip: BREACH SEALANT: Breaches on this enemy will automatically be repaired even in the absence of crew.

shipIcon.name: icon_cloakfire
shipIcon.tooltip: SHADOW WEAPONRY: This enemy can fire while cloaked without a penalty to its duration.

shipIcon.name: icon_crystal_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: CRYSTALLINE ARMOR: Every time you deal hull damage to this enemy with your weapons, there is a 33% chance that a shard will break off and fly towards your ship. It will not pierce any shields, but will do 1 damage to a random room if it hits.

shipIcon.name: icon_extinguishers
shipIcon.tooltip: EXTINGUISHERS: Fires aboard this enemy will be automatically (and slowly) extinguished even in the absence of crew.

shipIcon.name: icon_rock_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: ROCK PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 17% chance to resist hull damage from your weapons.

shipIcon.name: icon_regen_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: REGENERATIVE PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 10% chance to resist hull damage, and will automatically repair breaches even in the absence of crew.

shipIcon.name: icon_salt_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: SODIUM PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy makes it resilient to ion damage. Additionally, it has a very minor chance of resisting system damage.

shipIcon.name: icon_paladin_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: DIVINE ARMOR: Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Has an 85% chance to resist hull damage, but cannot resist breach weapons.

powerEffect.tooltip: Ready: Heal all other friendly crew in the room including themselves for 50 hitpoints.
Ready: Heal all other friendly crew in the room including themselves for 50 hitpoints.
Ready: Starts fires
Ready: Grants all other friendly crew on the same ship x2 repair, combat damage and 2.5x movement speed for 5 seconds.

Ready: Deploys a bomb that deals 15 crew damage, 1 system damage, and stun for 3 seconds, with a chance to start fires or breaches. Will temporarily slow down, increasing damage taken from all sources by 20% while moving at 20% speed.
Ready: Lockdown the room.
Toggle nano mode. In Nano Mode, the Separatist cannot attack, repair, or heal, but takes no hazard damage, ignores doors, and takes only 20% damage from combat.
Toggle solid mode. In Solid Mode, the Separatist can repair and attack normally.
Ready: Take greatly reduced damage, see adjacent rooms and resist Mind Control attempts for 15 seconds.
Ready: Shields himself and other allied crew and drones in the room temporarily, and also quadruples their repair speed.
Ready: Powers up a miniature aether shield. While active, provides 2 power to the current system and takes 50% less damage, but loses 2hp/s from radiation.
Ready: Powers up a miniature aether shield. While active, provides 2 power to the current system and takes 50% less damage, but loses 2hp/s from radiation.
Ready: Immediately kill the Devotee for 15 extra damage and 3 seconds stun to all crew.

Ready: Start suicide cooldown. When cooldown is finished, explode for 45 crew damage and 5 seconds of stun to all crew in the room. If the countdown is interrupted by death, the full damage will not be applied.
Ready: Initiate self destruction, exploding for 60 crew damage and 10 seconds of stun to all crew in the room. All other Zoltan crew in the room will explode as well.
Ready: Stun all crew in the room for 10 seconds.
Ready: Increase movement speed to 3.5x and crew damage to 3x for 7 seconds. Also increases damage taken from hazards by 4x.
Ready: Increase movement speed to 3x and crew damage to 2.2x for 7 seconds. Does NOT increase damage taken from hazards.
Ready: Take 7 health damage to increase movement speed to 5x and crew damage to 3.5x for 9 seconds. Does NOT increase damage taken from hazards.
Ready: Increase movement speed to 6x and crew damage to 4.3x for 10 seconds. Also increases damage taken from hazards by 7x, and cannot repair for the duration.
Ready: For one second, combat damage is massively increased.
Ready: Make nearby allied Mantis activate their Pheromone ability. Standard Hive Mantis will use the Free Mantis Synthethized Pheromones.
Ready: Start fires in the current room.
Ready: Temporarily move at normal speed but lose 50hp.
Ready: Temporarily move at normal speed.

Ready: Take 75 damage and gain greatly boosted stats for 12 seconds; 1.5x movement speed, 2.5x repair speed, sabotage and crew damage, 0.75x damage taken. Also reveals adjacent rooms and resist Mind Control attempts for the duration.
Ready: For 20 seconds; regenerate health at a rate of 65hp/s and gain 3x combat damage, but move at 0.25x speed and take 7x more damage from all sources.
Ready: Start fires in the current room.
Ready: Take 7 health damage to lock down the room for 12 seconds.
Ready: Take 7 health damage to lock down the room for 12 seconds. For the duration of the lockdown, allied crew in the room gain 50% hazard immunity, 25% repair speed, and 25% sabotage speed.
Ready: Take 7 health damage to lock down the room. Can be cast every 5 seconds.
Ready: Lock down the room and take halved damage for 12 seconds.
Ready: Lock down the room and decreases the ability cooldowns of allied crew in the room by 90%.
Ready: Drain 4 health per second from ALL nearby crew, for 15 seconds.
Auto: Hides in the box when at low health.
Auto: Hides in the box when at low health.
Ready: Hide in a box. It's very effective!
Auto: Hides in the box when at low health.
Ready: Cloak and become immune to damage for 20 seconds. Gain 3x sabotage damage, lowers movement speed to 0.4x, and cannot attack crew for the duration of the ability.

Ready: Deploy a Stun bomb (12s stun, 1 ion damage) in the current room, and cloak for 10 seconds, ignoring doors, taking 90% less damage, and regenerating health at 5hp/s. Moves at 60% speed while cloaked. Can only be used once per jump.

Ready: Cloak and drop a Breach bomb MK2 (3 system damage, 45 crew damage, no friendly fire). Cannot fight crew or repair while cloaked, but is immune to all damage and sabotage at 5x speed for 22 seconds.
Ready: Lose telepathic powers to stun all enemy crew in the room for 20 seconds.
Ready: Deploy a 30 damage Bio bomb that harms all other crew. Will temporarily cloak and cease movements and attacks for 6 seconds, granting 0.4x damage taken.

Ready: Deploy a Stun bomb (12s stun, 1 ion damage) on enemy crew and any current systems. Will temporarily cloak and cease movements for 12 seconds, granting 0.75x damage taken. Can still attack at 1x damage during the ability.
Ready: Neutralizes all crew in the room except himself for 20 seconds, setting their stats to default values. Does not impact abilities, death effects, or capabilities.
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Drain 4 health per second from ALL nearby crew, for 15 seconds.
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Deploy a small bomb. Kinda pathetic.
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Deploy a Breach, Ion, and Lockdown bomb. (30 crew damage, 2 system damage, 5s stun, 3 ion damage. No friendly fire, but can Ion your systems.)
Ready: Boost power drain to 3 power bars for 15 seconds. Will lose 3hp/s for the duration of the ability.

Ready: Temporarily disables the current system completely for 15 seconds. Cannot move and does 50% less combat damage for the duration. Allied crew including Tyrdeo will be unable to sabotage the disabled system for the duration.
Ready: Take 50 damage and deal 15 damage to enemy crew and 1 damage to enemy systems. Slowly regenerates the health lost for 26 seconds.
Ready: Take 50 damage and heal all friendly crew in the room to full health. Slowly regenerates the health lost for 13 seconds.

Ready: Take 50 damage and heal all friendly crew in the room to full health. Slowly regenerates the health lost, heal nearby friendlies for 4 health per second, and get 75% suffocation resistance for 13 seconds.
Ready: Take 50 damage and fully repair the current system. Slowly regenerates the health lost for 26 seconds.
Ready: Take 75 damage and deal 30 damage to enemy crew and 2 damage to enemy systems. Fortify itself for 15 seconds: 0.3x damage taken.
Ready: Take 15 damage and deal 15 damage to enemy crew and 1 damage to enemy systems. Can be rapidly cast, but regenerates little.
Ready: Take 7 health damage to lock down the room for 12 seconds.
Ready: Increase movement speed to 3x and crew damage to 2.2x for 7 seconds. Does NOT increase damage taken from hazards.
Ready: Drain 4 health per second from ALL nearby crew, for 15 seconds.
Ready: Take 50 damage and deal 15 damage to enemy crew and 1 damage to enemy systems. Slowly regenerates the health lost for 26 seconds.
Ready: Gain control of the spider for 12 seconds.
Ready: Gain control of the spider for 6 seconds.
Ready: Powers up a miniature aether shield. While active, provides 2 power to the current system and takes 50% less damage, but loses 2hp/s from radiation.
Ready: Boost power drain to 3 power bars for 10 seconds. Will lose 3hp/s for the duration of the ability.
Ready: Take greatly reduced damage, see adjacent rooms and resist Mind Control attempts for 15 seconds.
Ready: Cloak and become immune to damage for 20 seconds. Gain 3x sabotage damage, lowers movement speed to 0.4x, and cannot attack crew for the duration of the ability.
Ready: Increase movement speed to 3.5x and crew damage to 3x for 7 seconds. Also increases damage taken from hazards by 4x.
Ready: Take 15 damage and deal 15 damage to enemy crew and 1 damage to enemy systems. Can be rapidly cast, but regenerates little.
Ready: Take 7 health damage to increase movement speed to 5x and crew damage to 3.5x for 9 seconds. Does NOT increase damage taken from hazards.
Ready: Grants a 2hp/s regeneration and 50% movement speed bonus to other nearby spiders for 9 seconds.
Automatic: activates an ion pulse
Periodically opens a breach on the enemy ship.
Ready: Heal to full health, deal 1 hull damage to the current room, and gain x2 boosted stats for 8 seconds.
Ready: Heal to full health, deal 2 hull damage to the current room, and gain x4 boosted stats for 15 seconds.
Starts a fire in the current room.

Opens a breach in the current room.
Opens a breach in the current room.

Ready: Deals 30 damage to nearby crew and 1 system damage, 50% breach chance
Ready: Deals 3 ion damage to the current system
Ready: Eat nearby crew for 20 damage
Ready: Violently combust. Inflicts 2 system damage, 15 crew damage, 50% chances of fires, breach, stun. Uncontrollable for 3 seconds.
Ready: Starts a fire in the current room
Ready: Deals 1 system damage and open a breach in the current room
Ready: Gain control of the spider for 12 seconds.
Ready: Gain control of the spider for 12 seconds.
Ready: Gain control of the spider for 6 seconds.
Ready: Grants a 2hp/s regeration and 50% movement speed bonus to other nearby spiders for 9 seconds.
Ready: Grants a 2hp/s regeration and 50% movement speed bonus to other nearby spiders for 9 seconds.
Ready: Provides a 2hp/s regeneration and stun immunity to all friendly crew in the room.
Ready: Doubles the repair and sabotage speed of all allied crew in the room but lowers their max health by 25% temporarily.
Ready: Gain control of the pony for 15 seconds.
Ready: Lockdown the room.
Toggle liberated mode. The Cognitive will not be controllable but will gain massive boosts to all of its stats. Cannot be changed back for 30 seconds.
Toggle control mode. You will assume full control over the Cognitive, but it will lose its boosted stats. Cannot be changed back for 45 seconds.

Toggle control mode. You will assume full control over the Cognitive, but it will lose its boosted stats. Cannot be changed back for 60 seconds.

Ready: Distracts enemy crew with music

win.text: The galaxy is now a slightly worse place thanks to you.
Your victory will echo through the Multiverse for all time.
Your victory will echo through the Multiverse for all time.
Your legacy as savior of the Multiverse shall be forever known.
Your legacy shall be forever known.
Your legacy as a tyrant over the Multiverse shall be forever known.
